query:
UPDATE tasks SET
                summary = ?,
                description = ?,
                agent_type = ?,
                priority = ?,
                calculated_priority = ?,
                status = ?,
                dependencies = ?,
                dependency_type = ?,
                dependency_depth = ?,
                input_data = ?,
                result_data = ?,
                error_message = ?,
                retry_count = ?,
                max_retries = ?,
                max_execution_timeout_seconds = ?,
                started_at = ?,
                completed_at = ?,
                last_updated_at = ?,
                created_by = ?,
                parent_task_id = ?,
                session_id = ?,
                source = ?,
                deadline = ?,
                estimated_duration_seconds = ?,
                feature_branch = ?,
                task_branch = ?,
                worktree_path = ?
            WHERE id = ?
